targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  CONCAT(extract(`network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`orchestrator_url`, 'https://(.*)'), ' - ', `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`pipeline_key`) as orchestrator_short_uri,
  `median`(`network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`output_fps`) AS `median`,
  MAX(`network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`output_fps`) AS `max`
FROM
  `network_events`.`stream_status_view`
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(event_timestamp_ts)
  AND
  event_timestamp_ts < now() - INTERVAL 5 minute  -- last minutes data is missing pipeline_* data
  AND
  `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`orchestrator_url` NOT LIKE '%lvpr.io%' 
GROUP BY
  orchestrator_short_uri, `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`pipeline_key`
ORDER BY
  `median` DESC,
  orchestrator_short_uri ASC,
  `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`pipeline_key` ASC

SELECT
  CONCAT(extract(`network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`orchestrator_url`, 'https://(.*)'), ' - ', `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`pipeline_key`) as orchestrator_short_uri,
  COUNT(DISTINCT `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`stream_key`) AS `streams_count`
FROM
  `network_events`.`stream_status_view`
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(event_timestamp_ts)
  AND
  event_timestamp_ts < now() - INTERVAL 5 minute  -- last minutes data is missing pipeline_* data
  AND
  `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`orchestrator_url` NOT LIKE '%lvpr.io%' 
GROUP BY
  orchestrator_short_uri
ORDER BY
  `streams_count` DESC,
  orchestrator_short_uri ASC

panels.description: showing last 7 days data at max

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.event_timestamp_ts as time,
  CONCAT(extract(`network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`orchestrator_url`, 'https://(.*:.+)'), ' - ', `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`pipeline_key`) as pipeline,
  `median`(`network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`output_fps`) AS ` `
FROM
  `network_events`.`stream_status_view`
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(event_timestamp_ts)
  AND
  event_timestamp_ts < now() - INTERVAL 5 minute  -- last minutes data is missing pipeline_* data
  AND
  `time` >= now() - INTERVAL 7 DAY -- too much data breaks Grafana
  AND
  `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`orchestrator_url` NOT LIKE '%lvpr.io%' 
GROUP BY
  `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`orchestrator_url`, `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`pipeline_key`, `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.event_timestamp_ts
ORDER BY
  `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.event_timestamp_ts ASC,
  `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`orchestrator_url` ASC,
  `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`pipeline_key` ASC

panels.title: Median Output FPS by Orchestrator URL

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.event_timestamp_ts as `time`,
  CONCAT(extract(`network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`orchestrator_url`, 'https://(.*)'), ' - ', `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`pipeline_key`) as orchestrator_short_uri,
  COUNT(DISTINCT `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`stream_key`) AS ` `
FROM
  `network_events`.`stream_status_view`
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(event_timestamp_ts)
  AND
  event_timestamp_ts < now() - INTERVAL 5 minute  -- last minutes data is missing pipeline_* data
  AND
  `time` >= now() - INTERVAL 7 DAY
  AND  
  `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`orchestrator_url` NOT LIKE '%lvpr.io%'
GROUP BY
  orchestrator_short_uri, `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.event_timestamp_ts
ORDER BY
  `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.event_timestamp_ts ASC,
  ` ` DESC,
  orchestrator_short_uri ASC

SELECT
  toStartOfHour(`network_events`.`stream_status_view`.event_timestamp_ts) as _time,
  `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.pipeline_key,
  count(DISTINCT `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.orchestrator_url ) AS ` `
FROM
  `network_events`.`stream_status_view`
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(event_timestamp_ts)
  AND
  event_timestamp_ts < now() - INTERVAL 5 minute  -- last minutes data is missing pipeline_* data
  AND
  `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`orchestrator_url` NOT LIKE '%lvpr.io%'
  AND
  _time > '2025-09-17' -- we don't want to expose old models
GROUP BY
   pipeline_key, _time
ORDER BY
  _time ASC,
  pipeline_key ASC

SELECT
     toStartOfHour(`network_events`.`network_capabilities_view`.timestamp_ts) as `_time`,
     `network_events`.`network_capabilities_view`.`model_id` as model_id,
     count(distinct gpu_id) as ` `
FROM network_events.network_capabilities_view
WHERE
     $__timeFilter(timestamp_ts)
     AND
     timestamp_ts < now() - INTERVAL 5 minute  -- last minutes data is missing pipeline_* data
     AND
     orch_uri NOT LIKE '%lvpr.io%'
     AND
     _time > '2025-09-17' -- we don't want to expose old models
GROUP by _time, model_id
ORDER BY _time, ` ` DESC

SELECT
     toStartOfHour(`network_events`.`network_capabilities_view`.timestamp_ts) as `_time`,
     (extract(`network_events`.`network_capabilities_view`.`orch_uri`, 'https://(.*)') || ' (' || model_id || ')') as orchestrator_short_uri,
     count(distinct gpu_id) as ` `
FROM network_events.network_capabilities_view
WHERE
     `_time` >= now() - INTERVAL 31 DAY
     AND
     timestamp_ts < now() - INTERVAL 5 minute  -- last minutes data is missing pipeline_* data
     AND
     orch_uri NOT LIKE '%lvpr.io%' AND  $__timeFilter(timestamp_ts)
GROUP by _time, orchestrator_short_uri
ORDER BY _time, ` ` DESC

panels.title: Slow Orchestrators By Region

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  extract(`network_events`.`network_payments`.`orchestrator`, 'https://(.*)') as orchestrator_short_uri,
  SUM(`network_events`.`network_payments`.`expected_value_eth`) AS `expected_value_eth_sum`
FROM
  `network_events`.`network_payments`
WHERE
  `network_events`.`network_payments`.`orchestrator` NOT LIKE '%lvpr.io%' 
GROUP BY
  orchestrator_short_uri
ORDER BY
  `expected_value_eth_sum` DESC,
  orchestrator_short_uri ASC

panels.description: showing last 7 days data at max

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toStartOfHour(`network_events`.`network_payments`.timestamp_ts) as `time`,
  extract(`network_events`.`network_payments`.`orchestrator`, 'https://(.*)') as orchestrator_short_uri,
  SUM(`network_events`.`network_payments`.`expected_value_eth`) AS ` `
FROM
  `network_events`.`network_payments`
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp_ts)
  AND
  `network_events`.`network_payments`.`orchestrator` NOT LIKE '%lvpr.io%'
  AND `time` >= now() - INTERVAL 7 DAY
GROUP BY
  orchestrator_short_uri, `time`
ORDER BY
  `time` ASC,
  ` ` DESC,
  orchestrator_short_uri ASC

panels.title: Expected Value ETH: Hourly

panels.description: showing last 31 days data at max

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toStartOfDay(`network_events`.`network_payments`.timestamp_ts) as `time`,
  extract(`network_events`.`network_payments`.`orchestrator`, 'https://(.*)') as orchestrator_short_uri,
  SUM(`network_events`.`network_payments`.`expected_value_eth`) AS ` `
FROM
  `network_events`.`network_payments`
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp_ts)
  AND
  `network_events`.`network_payments`.`orchestrator` NOT LIKE '%lvpr.io%'
  AND `time` >= now() - INTERVAL 31 DAY
GROUP BY
  orchestrator_short_uri, `time`
ORDER BY
  `time` ASC,
  ` ` DESC,
  orchestrator_short_uri ASC

panels.title: Expected Value ETH: Daily

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  extract(`network_events`.`network_payments`.`orchestrator`, 'https://(.*)') as orchestrator_short_uri,
  SUM(`network_events`.`network_payments`.`expected_value_eth`) AS `expected_value_eth_sum`
FROM
  `network_events`.`network_payments`
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp_ts)
  AND
  `network_events`.`network_payments`.`orchestrator` NOT LIKE '%lvpr.io%' 
GROUP BY
  orchestrator_short_uri
ORDER BY
  `expected_value_eth_sum` DESC,
  orchestrator_short_uri ASC
